page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Web Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenance
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

components.name: Identity, Security & Operations || Key Management Service

incidents.name: [GLOBAL][Domains] - Domains Name incident notification on .MS
incidents.message: We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our .MS Domains offer, customers in the impacted zone are unable to perform some tasks on .MS domains. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 19/01/2026 08:00 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete) are temporarily unavailable for .MS domains. Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to perform specified operations on .MS domains. Root Cause : This incident is caused by our provider. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

incidents.name: [GRA][Collaborative solutions] - MailHA clusters incident notification
incidents.message: We had an incident on Collaborative solutions offer which has now been resolved. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 12/01/2026 11:36 UTC End time : 12/01/2026 11:52 UTC Impacted Service(s) : All MailHA clusters in GRA were unavailable. Customers Impact : Users were currently unable to log in to their email accounts via webmail or email clients, and cannot send or receive emails. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
